verses.verse: Now <S%H428>these<s%> are the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of the <S%H776>land,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5221>smote,<s%> and <S%H3423>possessed<s%> <S%H853><s%> their <S%H776>land<s%> on the other <S%H5676>side<s%> <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> toward the <S%H4217>rising<s%> of the <S%H8121>sun,<s%> from the <S%H4480>river<s%> <S%H5158><s%> <S%H769>Arnon<s%> <S%H5704>unto<s%> <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H2768>Hermon,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H6160>plain<s%> on the east: <S%H4217><s%>

Sihon <S%H5511><s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites,<s%> who <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> in <S%H2809>Heshbon,<s%> and <S%H4910>ruled<s%> from <S%H4480>Aroer,<s%> <S%H6177><s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H8193>bank<s%> of the <S%H5158>river<s%> <S%H769>Arnon,<s%> and from the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of the <S%H5158>river,<s%> and from <S%H2677>half<s%> <S%H1568>Gilead,<s%> even <S%H5704>unto<s%> the <S%H5158>river<s%> <S%H2999>Jabbok,<s%> which is the <S%H1366>border<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon;<s%>

And from the <S%H6160>plain<s%> <S%H5704>to<s%> the <S%H3220>sea<s%> of <S%H3672>Chinneroth<s%> on the <S%H4217>east,<s%> and <S%H5704>unto<s%> the <S%H3220>sea<s%> of the <S%H6160>plain,<s%> even the <S%H4417>salt<s%> <S%H3220>sea<s%> on the <S%H4217>east,<s%> the <S%H1870>way<s%> to <S%H1020>Beth-jeshimoth;<s%> and from the <S%H4480>south,<s%> <S%H8486><s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> Ashdoth-pisgah: <S%H798><s%>

And the <S%H1366>coast<s%> of <S%H5747>Og<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H1316>Bashan,<s%> which was of the <S%H4480>remnant<s%> <S%H3499><s%> of the <S%H7497>giants,<s%> that <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> at <S%H6252>Ashtaroth<s%> and at <S%H154>Edrei,<s%>

And <S%H4910>reigned<s%> in <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H2768>Hermon,<s%> and in <S%H5548>Salcah,<s%> and in <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H1316>Bashan,<s%> <S%H5704>unto<s%> the <S%H1366>border<s%> of the <S%H1651>Geshurites<s%> and the <S%H4602>Maachathites,<s%> and <S%H2677>half<s%> <S%H1568>Gilead,<s%> the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H5511>Sihon<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H2809>Heshbon.<s%>

Them did <S%H4872>Moses<s%> the <S%H5650>servant<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5221>smite:<s%> and <S%H4872>Moses<s%> the <S%H5650>servant<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> it for a <S%H3425>possession<s%> unto the <S%H7206>Reubenites,<s%> and the <S%H1425>Gadites,<s%> and the <S%H2677>half<s%> <S%H7626>tribe<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh.<s%>

And <S%H428>these<s%> are the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of the <S%H776>country<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5221>smote<s%> on this <S%H5676>side<s%> <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> on the <S%H3220>west,<s%> from <S%H4480>Baal-gad<s%> <S%H1171><s%> in the <S%H1237>valley<s%> of <S%H3844>Lebanon<s%> even <S%H5704>unto<s%> the <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H2510>Halak,<s%> that goeth <S%H5927>up<s%> to <S%H8165>Seir;<s%> which <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> unto the <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> for a <S%H3425>possession<s%> according to their <S%H4256>divisions;<s%>

In the <S%H2022>mountains,<s%> and in the <S%H8219>valleys,<s%> and in the <S%H6160>plains,<s%> and in the <S%H794>springs,<s%> and in the <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> and in the <S%H5045>south<s%> country; the <S%H2850>Hittites,<s%> the <S%H567>Amorites,<s%> and the <S%H3669>Canaanites,<s%> the <S%H6522>Perizzites,<s%> the <S%H2340>Hivites,<s%> and the Jebusites: <S%H2983><s%>
The <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H1756>Dor<s%> in the <S%H5299>coast<s%> of <S%H1756>Dor,<s%> <S%H259>one;<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations<s%> of <S%H1537>Gilgal,<s%> <S%H259>one;<s%>
